Directions: In a skillet, cook beef over medium heat until no longer pink; drain. Add the remaining ingredients and mix well. Transfer to a greased 13-in. x 9-in. x 2-in. baking dish. Cover and bake at 350 degrees F for 1-1/2 hours or until heated through.
Ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup, undiluted
1 (8 ounce) can sliced water chestnuts, drained
